message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I think it would be perfect for you! What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget of $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to that amount?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is my bottom line. I can't go any lower than that.
